analyzed: yasojattheragāthā  kāla pabbaṅga saṅkāsaḥ  kisaḥ dhamani santhato
translated: Yasoja🔽Pale as a broken rain cloud,🔽emaciated, with veins protruding,
knowing moderation in food and drink,
a man with an undepressed mind.
in the wilderness, in a great forest,
like an elephant in the head of battle,
more is just a racket.”🔽… the elder Yasoja …
